name: BFDUR: 3 is greater than 1
description:
Story/How to play

B0B0 and his friends Aaron (IDK sounded cool) and Bunny Rabbit (I wasn't creative that day) are trying to get to the end of the game. In order to do this you will need to press buttons and lead them to their respective blocks. Sometimes you need to push Aaron and Bunny rabbit to their blocks, in order to do this you will need to just walk up to them with them they will go flying in that direction so be careful with your unstoppable power.

3 Fun facts because FUN

  • rabbits are cool
  • Bunny rabbit is a golden retriever unibunny rabbit
  • BFDUR stands for B0B0 the fuffy dodo unibunny rabbit
